meanings.definition: The quality or state of being extremely precise or accurate.
meanings.sent1: Her ultraprecision in solving math problems impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The scientist's ultraprecision in conducting experiments led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The chef's ultraprecision in cutting vegetables made them look like tiny works of art.
meanings.sent4: His ultraprecision in timing the race was compared to a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The watchmaker's ultraprecision in crafting gears was unmatched in the industry.

meanings.definition: The process or technique of achieving extremely precise measurements or results.
meanings.sent1: The ultraprecision of the microscope allowed us to see tiny details in the cells.
meanings.sent2: Using ultraprecision tools, the engineer was able to create intricate designs with ease.
meanings.sent3: The ultraprecision of the laser cutter made cutting through metal seem like a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraprecision in following the recipe resulted in a perfectly baked cake.
meanings.sent5: The artist used ultraprecision to paint the fine details of the portrait.
